author: Kevin Stratvert
description:
This new update lets Gmail summarize long email threads, surface what matters in your inbox, and answer questions in plain English — so you spend less time reading email and more time getting things done.

▶️ Complete breakdown in the full YouTube video.
title: Gmail just became an AI command center 🤯

author: Kevin Stratvert
description:
Gmail just received one of its biggest AI upgrades in years. Google is rolling out powerful new features designed to fight inbox overload — and some of them are completely free.

In this video, I walk you through all the new Gmail AI features, including AI summaries for long email threads, smarter reply suggestions that match your tone, tools to help you write emails from scratch, advanced proofreading, and even the ability to ask your inbox questions in plain English. I’ll also explain which features are free, which ones require a Google AI Pro or Ultra subscription, and what’s still rolling out to testers.

If your inbox feels overwhelming, these updates could change how you use email every day.

Host: Kevin Stratvert

title: Gmail Just Got a Massive AI Upgrade (Free + Paid Features Explained)
